text:
Delhi!

Currently, in Delhi, it's a hot summer day with a temperature of 34.4°C and a humidity of 44%. The sky is mostly clear, with a gentle breeze of 3.6 m/s.

For the rest of the day, expect it to remain hot and sunny, with temperatures ranging from 33°C to 35°C. As the night falls, it will gradually cool down, becoming partly cloudy by midnight.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, expect a similar hot and sunny day, with temperatures ranging from 28°C to 35°C. There's a slight chance of scattered clouds in the afternoon, but overall, it'll be a warm and sunny day in Delhi!
